column4: Hey, does anyone know why programs "hog" the audio in hardy? Is this a problem with pulseaudio?
And by "hog", I mean if a program is running with audio, another program may not be allowed to have audio simultaneously
My experience with pulseaudio in Hardy was that it did not work too well for multiple apps.  Intrepid seems better, but I have not tested that much.
Should I try uninstalling and changing default to ALSA?
